data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description for your repository. This text will appear at the top of the repository on your page

data.name: plCategory.Help
data.value: Enter the Categories for this repository. To add a new Category, enter the name of the category and click on the Add Category link. To edit a Category, select it and click on the pencil icon. Use the X and arrow icons to delete and change the order of your categories.

data.name: plPageSize.Text
data.value: Enter the number of Items Per Page

data.name: plRatingImage.Text
data.value: Image set to use for Ratings

data.name: plFolders.Text
data.value: Specify the folders to store the Repository files

data.name: plPageSize.Help
data.value: Enter the number of files that will display on a page. The default value is 5

data.name: plRSSFeed.Help
data.value: Check this option if you would like to make an RSS feed of the files in your repository available to other web sites. You can turn this on or off at any time

data.name: plSecurityRoles.Help
data.value: Check the security roles that you would like to assign to each repository function

data.name: plSkin.Help
data.value: Select the skin to use for your repository

data.name: plRatingImage.Help
data.value: Select the image set to use for the Ratings feature of the repository

data.name: plNoImage.Help
data.value: If there is no image uploaded for an item, select the image to use

data.name: plApprovedFolder.Help
data.value: Enter the full path to the location where the Repository folder will be located. For example: C:\Inetpub\WWWRoot\DNN20\Portals\0\Repository

data.name: plUnapprovedFolder.Help
data.value: Enter the full path to the location where the Pending folder will be located. For example: C:\Inetpub\WWWRoot\DNN20\Portals\0\Repository\Pending

data.name: plAnonymousFolder.Help
data.value: Enter the full path to the location where files uploaded by Anonymous Users will be located. For example: C:\Inetpub\WWWRoot\DNN20\Portals\0\Repository\Anonymous

data.name: plUploadFields.Help
data.value: Select whether this repository allows uploading Files only, Images only, or Files with Images

data.name: plUserFolders.Text
data.value: Do you wish to store each user's files in their own folder?

data.name: plUserFolders.Help
data.value: If checked, each user's uploaded will be stored in their own folder with the Approved Files folder. If NOT checked, then all user uploads will be stored directly in the Approved Files folder.

data.name: plViewComments.Help
data.value: Select whether only users who can post comments can see them, or can everyone see comments

data.name: plViewRatings.Help
data.value: Select whether only users who can post ratings can see them, or can everyone see ratings

data.name: plAttribute.Help
data.value: Setup any custom attributes for this Repository module.

data.name: plValues.Help
data.value: Setup the possible values for the currently selected custom attribute.

data.name: DeleteCategory.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Category?

data.name: DeleteAttribute.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Attribute?

data.name: DeleteValue.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Value?

data.name: UserFolders.Text
data.value: Store uploaded files in User folders

data.name: hasItemsCannotDelete.Text
data.value: You cannot delete a Category that has Items assigned to it.

data.name: lblAllFiles.Help
data.value: Checking this will insert a category named All Items that will allow a user to see all items regardless of the category they are assigned to

data.name: plFolders.Help
data.value: Enter the location where you would like the Repository module to store uploaded files.
